description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. AtomHex is a colourful, fast-paced shooter where you pilot your ship through a world filled with Atoms, Hexes and their enemy offspring. Collect Power-ups and chain Multipliers to attain outrageous scores. Can you survive long enough for 6 Atoms to join a Hex and go Subatomic?
description.short: AtomHex is a colourful, fast-paced shooter where you pilot your ship through a world filled with Atoms, Hexes and their enemy offspring. Collect Power-ups and chain Multipliers to attain outrageous scores. Can you survive long enough for 6 Atoms to join a Hex and go Subatomic?
